Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
BYU-Idaho Single Student Approved Housing provides an atmosphere where single students can learn, live and grow together in atmosphere condusive to learning and living the gospel. All of Approved Housing maintain the same standards.


On-Campus

For students of all ages and majors, BYU-Idaho dorms and apartments provide an ideal atmosphere for learning and growing, with the advantage of being on-campus. Learn more about on-campus housing or sign-up today.

Off-Campus

With over 110 different units, off-campus approved housing offers a variety of styles at competive prices, all participating in helping students have a successful and meaninful apartment living experience. All approved housing units are independently owned and operated but work closely with the university in an effort to help students have a meaningful apartment living experience.To learn more about approved housing, click here.

To begin looking for an approved housing contract, use the tools to the right or take a look at the quick links below.
